p: The single crystal of PROG-CNA was obtained by the evaporation method from a mixed solvent of EtOH/water (1:1, v/ v) containing a 1:1 molar ratio of PROG and CNA. X-ray diffraction analysis shows the expected crystal structure of PROG-CNA in 1:1 molecular stoichiometry was successfully obtained ( Figure 2a). The final residual factor, R 1 = 0.0375, was acceptable. Moreover, the PROG-CNA co-crystal belongs to the orthorhombic system and has an achiral space group of P2 12 12 1, due to the chiral structure of PROG.
